text: The 1921 Akron football team represented the University of Akron in the 1921 college football season as a part of the Ohio Athletic Conference (OAC). The team was led by seventh-year head coach Fred Sefton. Akron outscored their opponents by a total of 117–69 and finished with a 5–3 record. ==Schedule== ==References== Akron Category:Akron Zips football seasons Akron football
title: 1921 Akron football team
